body.p: The Standard requires a different treatment from IAS 20 Accounting for Government Grants and Disclosure of Government Assistance in the circumstances described above. IAS 20 is to be applied only to government grants related to biological assets measured at cost less any accumulated depreciation and any accumulated impairment losses.
